pullRequest.title: Add JSON-B customization to OptaPlanner extension
pullRequest.bodyText:
Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/PLANNER-1880
CI build currently fails due to missing optaplanner-persistence-jsonb dependency. This dependency will be provided by optaplanner-bom once OptaPlanner version 7.35.0.Final is released. Any feedback is appreciated!

nodes.bodyText:
This is wierd. Does it work?
It doesn't modify the incoming config parameter, it reassigns it. Does this do anything?
Move this under the optaplanner-jackson module a few lines up - keep em together.
I would say let's add another 5 minutes here since we are adding a new module
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -406,6 +406,7 @@ jobs:
               logging-gelf
               bootstrap-config
               optaplanner-jackson
+              optaplanner-jsonb
           # kubernetes-client alone takes 30mn+
           - category: Misc3
             timeout: 50

afterCommit.message: Add JSON-B customization module to OptaPlanner extension

nodes.bodyText:
This exposes the list of score implementations in quarkus, which is a maintenance problem in the long term. We regularly add score implementations upstream.
@cuijulian Can you open a jira to "add OptaPlannerJsonbConfig.getScoreAdaptorList() in optaplanner-persistence-jaxb" and add a comment here, something like "// TODO replace by  once released to avoid hardcoding the score implementations"
Then this PR is mergable. Once that jira is fixed and optaplanner is released, we send in a PR to quarkus to fix the TODO.
Doesn't need to be return a List. getScoreAdaptors() that returns a Class array is good too. Whatever works best.

beforeCommit.message: Add JSON-B customization module to OptaPlanner extension

afterCommit.message: Add JSON-B customization module to OptaPlanner extension

nodes.bodyText:
@cuijulian (very soft suggestion - as we need to wait for optaplanner 7.35 to go out anyway): would you mind adding a hint in this TODO when it will be possible to fix it? For example: "when upgrading to optaplanner 7.36" (that TODO fix didn't make 7.35 which is being released). Before it was merged, I'd use the Jira url.
Also it's unclear which class has "getScoreAdaptorList()", making it hard for others your yourself in 6 months to figure out this TODO easily.

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this be a dependency on quarkus-jsonb-deployment instead?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+        <artifactId>quarkus-optaplanner-jsonb-parent</artifactId>
+        <version>999-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <artifactId>quarkus-optaplanner-jsonb-deployment</artifactId>
+    <name>Quarkus - OptaPlanner JSON-B - Deployment</name>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>quarkus-core-deployment</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>quarkus-arc-deployment</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>quarkus-jsonb-spi</artifactId>

nodes.bodyText: If you have the optaplanner dependency here, you need the deployment counterpart in the deployment pom.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,56 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+        <artifactId>quarkus-optaplanner-jsonb-parent</artifactId>
+        <version>999-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <artifactId>quarkus-optaplanner-jsonb</artifactId>
+    <name>Quarkus - OptaPlanner JSON-B - Runtime</name>
+    <description>Activate JSON-B bindings for OptaPlanner's Score classes</description>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>quarkus-core</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>quarkus-jsonb</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+            <artifactId>quarkus-optaplanner</artifactId>
